# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper Plate Mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities (e.g. burner mining drill, burner inserter) have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities (e.g. stone furnace) have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without being connected to a network
- Ensure that entities (e.g. steam engine) are connected to a network (e.g. electricity network) before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
